@Table MULT is used to prepare the balance which has to be
shown on the history screen
If the selection (specially the SORT) of INVH has to be changed, also
the init of the multi selection table has to be changed
-- Cancel = 'C'
-- Dunning costs --> ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 16
-- Legal costs --> ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 100
-- Legal interest --> ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 101
-- Perform bookings only if an INVU row was handled
-- INVU_TYPE = 1 (paid discount) or INVU_TYPE = 3 or 4 (interest)
-- Init v.PAID (uses to update PI.PAYMENTCODE of BPH113)
-- Recalculation of entered amount
-- Store BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE
-- INVU_TYPE = 2 (dunning costs), 5 (legal costs) or 6 (legal interest)
-- Recalculation of entered amount
.. dunning costs
.. legal costs
.. legal interest
-- BPIV row exists for partial or unspecified payment (see also SQL-WhereClause)
-- Perform bookings only if an INVU row was handled, means
was selected or an amount was entered
Step 1: Update INVOICE_UNBOOKED
Step 2: Store INVOICE_UNBOOKED_HISTORY
